translator: Max Müller (Sacred Books of the East) — Public Domain
text: 1. Om 1 ! Let us explain S îkshâ, the doctrine of pronunciation, viz. letter, accent, quantity, effort (in the formation of letters), modulation, and union of letters (sandhi). This is the lecture on S îkshâ.
